law.text: The secretary for energy and environment may cooperate with the federal government or agencies thereof, other agencies of the Commonwealth, county or municipal governments, agencies of neighboring states, or other public or private organizations, or individuals and may accept such funds, equipment, supplies or services from cooperators and others as may be deemed appropriate. The secretary may provide in agreements with the federal government or its agencies for matching of federal funds as required under federal laws relating to forest pests.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 172, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 6, effective June 16, 1960.
